title: Lab Attendance
content: Is it mandatory to maintain 75% attendance in lab as well? I was absent for the first 2 weeks of 2nd semester and so I have 1/3 attendance in both my labs. The total no. of lab classes we can "bunk" is supposedly 3 and I have already missed out on 2 of em. I'm pretty sure I'll need more of a buffer than just 1 more class over the course of the semester, so what do I do? One of my friends said he heard that for labs the criteria is 65% but he's not sure, is that true? Has anybody gotten by with less than 75% in labs before?

comments.body: You need 75 in the lab as well
